content: remember my first iphone pocket chic ribbed blsc phone pocket holder here is one that s ever easier and quicker to make and will fit any phone you have although it s not as stretchy as the original it s looser thicker stitches will work up much quicker and give it a beautiful ridged texture this mobile cozy is perfect for busy parents students and older adults it s quick to make and super easy to attach or detach from any bag backpack strap stroller handle or walking aid
